text:
Donnelley Financial Solutions | Senior/Principal Software Engineers | ONSITE | $150k to $200k | Bellevue, WA | https://accuracyiseverything.com/

We are building an engineering environment focused on collaboration and mentorship. We are going through a modernization effort using Go, Python, Erlang/Elixir, React, Docker, Kubernetes. Our engineering principles: Focus on the Important, We are all Craftsman, We are all Scientists, Simple is Obvious, Embrace Diversity, Authenticity, Protect our Clients, Collaboration

Email me for more information at jon.moon@dfsco.com
